nodes.name: Start every hour past 11 minutes

nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
## Cron trigger
Google Trends update the RSS feed every 10 minutes. This will start wordflow 1 minute after.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content:
## CONFIGURATION
min_traffic is a numeric value. Google Trend RSS has an approx traffic value 100, 200, 500, 1000 etc.

max_result is a numeric value used to limit max rss to scrape

jina_key is the jina.ai API key

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note2

parameters.content:
## Google Sheet Database
This is main sheet where all your Editorial plan will be saved.

The column status value could be a trigger for other automations

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note3

parameters.content:
## Google Trends request

We get last kwyword in trend. Every item has a main keyword and 3 URL. We will use those url to scrape content and generate a combined summary

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note4

parameters.content:
## Simple conversion

Converts XML RSS into a more readable json object

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note5

parameters.content:
## Building dataset

Here we limits results, filter by mmin traffic and we flat the RSS structure to adapt to Google Sheet, fields are renamed as per description.

Then RSS result and Google Sheet is compared, if a new keyword is found we have result. If RSS give a keyword already srtored, this node doesn't give any output.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note6

parameters.content:
## Data mapping

Here you have all fields needed in Google Sheet.

While done, the content of 3 website linked in Google Trends RSS will be merged in a single Summary field

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note7

parameters.content:
## Data check

Sometimes scraping HTML content fails (for some reasons), that's normal but this should avoid to save a zero content if all 3 scraping nodes will fail

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

parameters.content:
## Data mapping

Here you have all fields needed in Google Sheet.

While done, the content of 3 website linked in Google Trends RSS will be merged in a single Summary field

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# My workflow 2

## Overview
Automated workflow: My workflow 2. This workflow integrates 12 different services: stickyNote, httpRequest, code, scheduleTrigger, noOp. It contains 36 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 36
- **Node Types**: 12
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **When clicking ‘Test workflow’**: manualTrigger
- **XML**: xml
- **GoogleTrends**: httpRequest
- **CONFIG**: set
- **Get saved keywords**: googleSheets
- **Loop Over Items**: splitInBatches
- **Mapping**: set
- **Google Sheets**: googleSheets
- **New keywords**: code
- **content1**: httpRequest
- ... and 26 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
